description:
protection that breathes, these soft shell pants are ready for your cool weather pursuits. The FRӦST™ Pant boasts a moisture-wicking waistband, convenient zippered pockets, and ankle zips ensuring compatibility with winter boots.

  • DWR finish sheds light moisture
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees enhance freedom of movement
  • Zippers at ankles so you can slide them over your boots
name: Kuhl Frost Softshell Pants - Women's
